mapper.select: select o.*, (select sum(p.proj_num) from produce_plan p where o.order_sn = p.order_no and o.tenant_id = p.tenant_id ) as proj_num, (select sum(ptv.store_num) from plan_track_view ptv where ptv.proj_code in (select proj_code from produce_plan p where o.order_sn = p.order_no and o.tenant_id = p.tenant_id) and ptv.tenant_id = o.tenant_id) as store_num from produce_order o WHERE o.id = '${id}'
